name: Dad's Candied Salmon
author: Mrs.Unionjack
summary: This hot and sweet salmon dish can be done in the oven or on the grill. My Dad has been making this for us for years. Serve with new potatoes, corn, green salad and rolls.
directions: Preheat an oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Place the salmon onto a baking sheet lined with aluminum foil with the skin side down
Rub the mustard into the flesh of the salmon and then spread the brown sugar evenly over the fish
Squeeze the lemon over the salmon
Bring the edges of the foil together and seal into a packet
Bake in the preheated oven until the fish flakes easily with a fork, 25 to 30 minutes
